| HistoryText             = 
===Origin===
With an increasing number in the student body, [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]] & [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]] reorganized the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]]'s educational and training program.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #1}} The Paladins Squad was advised by [[Katherine Pryde (Earth-616)|Shadowcat]].{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 13}}

===Astonishing===
This squad suffered some terrible losses during the semester. The first came when [[Edward Tancredi (Earth-616)|Wing]] was depowered by [[Ord (SWORD) (Earth-616)|Ord]] with the [[Hope Serum]].{{r|Astonishing X-Men Vol 3 #5}} Later, Wing committed suicide in an attempt to reactivate his powers after being coerced by [[Danger (Earth-616)|Danger]].{{r|Astonishing X-Men Vol 3 #7}} Finally, when [[Sentient World Observation and Response Department (Earth-616)|S.W.O.R.D.]] took the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] (and [[Hisako Ichiki (Earth-616)|Armor]]) to [[Breakworld]], Shadowcat became trapped inside a giant bullet in order to save [[Earth]].{{r|Astonishing X-Men Vol 3 #19|#24}}{{r|Giant-Size Astonishing X-Men #1}}

===Members===
*[[Hisako Ichiki (Earth-616)|Armor]] - Hisako Ichiki is a strong willed girl who creates psionic armor around herself. Retained her powers and remained with the X-Men.
*[[Ruth Aldine (Earth-616)|Blindfold]] - Ruth Aldine is an odd mannered, physically blind girl who can see the future and read minds. Retained her powers and remained with the X-Men.
*[[Edward Tancredi (Earth-616)|Wing]] - Eddie Tancredi could fly and aspired to become an [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Man]]. He was depowered by [[Ord (SWORD) (Earth-616)|Ord]] with the [[Hope Serum]].{{r|Astonishing X-Men Vol 3 #5}} He later committed suicide in an attempt to reactivate his powers.{{r|Astonishing X-Men Vol 3 #7}}

===M-Day===
After [[Decimation|M-Day]] only 27 of 182 enrolled Xavier's students retained their powers. The Paladins Squad was disbanded along with all the other [[X-Men Training Squads]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #20|#23}}

| Equipment               =

| Weapons                 = 

| Notes                   = 
*Due to losing both [[Edward Tancredi (Earth-616)|Wing]] and [[Katherine Pryde (Earth-616)|Shadowcat]], it is likely that they did not participate in the Field Day events, and it is possible that this squad was disbanded prior to [[Decimation|M-Day]].
| Trivia                  = 
* The Paladins Squad was never seen fully on-panel.
